title: Hidden Message in MIDA Shirts
content: (Credit to u/codyatwork) Marathon fans have found a secret message in the Marathon MIDA shirts given to fans, thanks to u/codyatwork for putting it together in one post:

title: Marathon Fans Recieve T-Shirts
content: (Credit to u/m1k3y60659) Marathon fans have recieved T-Shirts from Bungie, with each of the shirts coming with a little puzzle for fans to solve:

title: ViDoc Released for Marathon
content: Bungie Released the first ViDoc for Marathon: What is Marathon?, check out the link to see it:
